items.title: Voice of Customer VOC Techniques Training and Certification

items.headline: Learn to set achievable goals, improve your habits & take your business and sales to the next level!
objectives_summary: Master the art of effective goal-setting and time management
Set S.M.A.R.T. (specific, measurable, achievable, results-oriented, time-bound) goals in your personal and business life
Use OKR in order to quarterly re-evaluate your business goals

items.title: Blockchain for Business: How To Make Money With Blockchain

objectives_summary: Know the key concepts of Blockchain.
